attributes.action: Create free travel on public transport for students, teenagers and children...
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am requesting that the Government create free travel on public transport for students, teenagers and children because it is by far too expensive for students, teenagers and children to travel on everyday when going to school and elsewhere; it will encourage students, teenagers and children to use public transport, so it is beneficial for the environment.
